professional_summary: AI/ML Engineer with 4+ years of experience in developing deep learning models, deploying NLP solutions, and leading data-driven projects. Skilled at working across the ML lifecycle from data preprocessing to production deployment. Passionate about Generative AI and scalable ML systems.

work_experience.description: Designed and deployed a BERT-based question-answering system used by 50,000+ employees. Led a team of 3 engineers to optimize NLP pipelines, reducing inference latency by 40%. Integrated CI/CD workflows for ML models with Docker & Kubernetes on AWS.
key_responsibilities: Designed and deployed a BERT-based question-answering system used by 50,000+ employees.
Led a team of 3 engineers to optimize NLP pipelines, reducing inference latency by 40%.
Integrated CI/CD workflows for ML models with Docker & Kubernetes on AWS.

work_experience.description: Built a computer vision system for defect detection in manufacturing using YOLOv5. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy ML solutions at scale. Developed predictive analytics dashboards using Tableau.
key_responsibilities: Built a computer vision system for defect detection in manufacturing using YOLOv5.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy ML solutions at scale.

work_experience.description: Built customer churn prediction models using scikit-learn and XGBoost. Automated preprocessing pipelines with Python and SQL.

projects.description: Built a medical chatbot using Llama 2 + LangChain with RAG from clinical PDFs.
